description:
The time is near future-Tokyo, Japan in 2040. Reito, a young man suffering from an intractable disease, vows to reunite with his childhood friend Erisa and decides to "cold sleep" to cure his illness. When he wakes up five years later, the world was undergoing a major transformation. The MK (Male Killer) virus kills 99.9% of men on the planet. The ground was a super harem with 5 billion women for every 5 men.

(Source: Crunchyroll)

Note: The series was originally scheduled to release in the Fall 2021. Delayed last minute, episode 1 aired as scheduled on October 8, 2021 as a "special advanced broadcast" with the rest pushed back to Winter 2022.
synonyms: ฮาเร็มวันสิ้นโลก

tags.name: Female Harem
tags.description: Main cast features the protagonist plus several female characters who are romantically interested in them.

tags.name: Nudity
tags.description: Features a character wearing no clothing or exposing intimate body parts.

tags.name: Pandemic
tags.description: Prominently features a disease prevalent over a whole country or the world.

tags.name: Male Protagonist
tags.description: Main character is male.

tags.name: Large Breasts
tags.description: Features a character with larger-than-average breasts.

tags.name: Primarily Female Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of female characters.

tags.name: Heterosexual
tags.description: Prominently features a romance between a man and a woman, not inherently sexual.

tags.name: Dystopian
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a society characterized by poverty, squalor or oppression.

tags.name: POV
tags.description: Point of View; features scenes shown from the perspective of the series protagonist.

tags.name: Conspiracy
tags.description: Contains one or more factions controlling or attempting to control the world from the shadows.

tags.name: Politics
tags.description: Centers around politics, politicians, or government activities.

tags.name: Survival
tags.description: Centers around the struggle to live in spite of extreme obstacles.

tags.name: Femdom
tags.description: Female Dominance. Features sexual acts with a woman in a dominant position.

tags.name: Ensemble Cast
tags.description: Features a large cast of characters with (almost) equal screen time and importance to the plot.

tags.name: Tragedy
tags.description: Centers around tragic events and unhappy endings.

tags.name: Love Triangle
tags.description: Centered around romantic feelings between more than two people. Includes all love polygons.

tags.name: School
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a primary or secondary educational institution.

tags.name: Group Sex
tags.description: Features more than two participants engaged in sex simultaneously.

tags.name: Shounen
tags.description: Target demographic is teenage and young adult males.

tags.name: Terrorism
tags.description: Centers around the activities of a terrorist or terrorist organization.

tags.name: Human Pet
tags.description: Features characters in a master-slave relationship where one is the "owner" and the other is a "pet."

tags.name: Teacher
tags.description: Protagonist is an educator, usually in a school setting.

tags.name: Rape
tags.description: Features non-consensual sexual penetration.

tags.name: Military
tags.description: Centered around the life and activities of military personnel.

tags.name: Bisexual
tags.description: Features a character who is romantically or sexually attracted to people of more than one sex or gender.

tags.name: Time Skip
tags.description: Features a gap in time used to advance the story.

tags.name: LGBTQ+ Themes
tags.description: Prominently features characters or themes associated with the LGBTQ+ community, such as sexuality or gender identity.

tags.name: Yandere
tags.description: Prominently features a character who is obsessively in love with another, to the point of acting deranged or violent.

tags.name: Age Gap
tags.description: Prominently features romantic relations between people with a significant age difference.

node.description:
__Doujin Circle:__ Pannacott

She is married to someone outside of the industry of manga and anime.

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/kotaro_shono)

Former adult game scenario writer. He is a creator of cult classic Shizuku, Kizuato and To Heart.

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/t_takahasi)

__[Facebook](https://www.facebook.com/profile.php?id=100003558003913)__

__Residency:__ Fujisawa, Kanagawa Prefecture, Japan
__Graduated:__ Kugenuma High School, Yoyogi Animation Academy

__Aiko Matsuyama__ is a Japanese color designer and digital painter, who mainly does finishing.

__[Website (as H-el-ical//)](https://h-el-ical.com/) | [Twitter (as H-el-ical//)](https://twitter.com/Helicalproject) | [Profile (Space Craft Group)](http://spacecraft.co.jp/hikaru/)__

__Birthplace:__ Toyama City, Toyama Prefecture, Japan
__Height:__ 155 cm
__Nicknames:__ ひーちゃん (Hi-chan), ぴかりん (Hikarin), ぴかちゃん (Hika-chan)

__Introduction:__
Hikaru//, alternatively known as H-el-ical//, otherwise simply known as Hikaru, is a vocalist and lyricist. She was a member of the band Kalafina until their disbandment in 2019. After they disbanded she started a solo project under the name H-el-ical//. 

__Biography:__
She has been active in the music industry since she was seven years old, and was active as a background singer before joining Kalafina in May of 2008 where she was active under the name Hikaru.

**[Website](https://exina.jp/)** | **[Twitter](https://twitter.com/EXiNA_XiENA)** | **[Facebook](https://www.facebook.com/exinaofficial/)** | **[Blog (JP)](https://ameblo.jp/shiena-nishizawa/)** | **[Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/exina_xiena/)** | **[YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCKUR1GWKBZbFByLoPeRxDtA)** | **[Artist Page (Flying Dog)](https://www.jvcmusic.co.jp/flyingdog/-/Artist/A024998.html)**

**Introduction:**
Shiena Nishizawa, alternatively known by stage name EXiNA, is a Japanese vocalist, lyricist and composer. She debuted under record label flying DOG after winning the grand prize at the label's first audition, she is now under record label [SACRA MUSIC](http://sacramusic.jp/artist/) (which is under Sony Music Entertainment).

**Biography:**
In junior high school, she became immersed in music when she received her father's guitar as a gift. She dreamed that one that she would sing in front of a large number of people as an artist, and in 2014 she won the grand prize at the "First flying DOG Audition". In 2015 she performed the ending theme song to the TV anime *"[Kantai Collection: Kancolle](https://anilist.co/anime/20553/Kantai-Collection-KanColle)"*, which was also her debut as a musician. 

Shiena announed a solo project on July 9, 2019, going from using her real name Shiena Nishizawa to adopting a new stage name EXiNA (which is an anagram of her given name Shiena = EXiNA). Her first release as EXiNA was a digital single released on July 10, 2019 titled 'EQ'. She went on to release a second digital single on August 3, 2019 titled 'KATANA', and then followed-up by releasing her third single on August 14, 2019 titled 'OVERTHINKING BOY'. Her first mini-album was released on August 21, 2019 titled 'XiX', which was also her first album-like release under her new stage name.

(Source: [generasia.com](http://www.generasia.com/wiki/Nishizawa_Shiena) | [ja.wikipedia.org](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/%E8%A5%BF%E6%B2%A2%E5%B9%B8%E5%A5%8F), edited)

[Blog](http://halfawake.blog.shinobi.jp/%E8%87%AA%E5%B7%B1%E7%B4%B9%E4%BB%8B/%E7%81%AF%E5%A4%A2) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/LlittleTomBoy) | [Facebook](https://www.facebook.com/halfawakerobotman/)

Tom is a Japanese composite artist and designer affiliated with company [Digital Noise](https://d-noise.co.jp/).
